citations.narrative:
At time of inspection the acquisition paperwork was not complete. Several of the animals on hand did not have
documented identification, although microchipped. To promote accurate record keeping, the licensee should complete the
acquisition records by documenting the microchip numbers.
To be corrected by 9.19.25

At time of inspection two Shih Tzu's (Cora 991003001835903 and Dora 992000001396905) and a Poodle (Jack
901001000067032) were exhibiting matted hair coats. Matted hair can cause pain, discomfort and potential skin issues.
The licensee should consult the program of veterinary care for guidance on healthy unmatted hair coat.
To be corrected by: 9.19.25
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(a)(1)(vi) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
At time of inspection the acquisition paperwork was not complete. Several of the animals on hand did not have 
documented identification, although microchipped. To promote accurate record keeping, the licensee should complete the 
acquisition records by documenting the microchip numbers.  
 
To be corrected by 9.19.25 
3.13(a)(4) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
At time of inspection two Shih Tzu's (Cora 991003001835903 and Dora 992000001396905) and a Poodle (Jack 
901001000067032) were exhibiting matted hair coats. Matted hair can cause pain, discomfort and potential skin issues. 
The licensee should consult the program of veterinary care for guidance on healthy unmatted hair coat.  
 
To be corrected by: 9.19.25 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Licensee.
